meanings.definition: The quality or state of being irreproachable.
meanings.sent1: Her irreproachablenesses in her work ethic earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The irreproachablenesses of his character made him a role model for others.
meanings.sent3: Despite his irreproachablenesses, he still managed to make everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The irreproachablenesses of the painting left the art critics speechless.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's irreproachablenesses in fairness made her students trust her completely.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being beyond criticism or blame.
meanings.sent1: The irreproachablenesses of the plan ensured its success.
meanings.sent2: His irreproachablenesses in handling the situation saved the company from a crisis.
meanings.sent3: Even with his irreproachablenesses, he still managed to spill coffee on his shirt.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's irreproachablenesses on the field inspired his teammates to do better.
meanings.sent5: The chef's irreproachablenesses in cooking left the customers wanting more.
